description:
Few shows thrill, shock, horrify, and delight their fans quite like American Horror Story does. Every season we’re treated to a new story, locations, characters, time frames, and slight variations in the core cast. After Murder House, some actors who played minor characters (Jessica Lange, Lily Rabe, Sarah Paulson, Evan Peters) were catapulted into starring roles, while other actors, like Connie Britton, were never seen on American Horror Story again. Shame, that. 《美国恐怖故事》是那种能给我们带来惊险、刺激、激动、并能很好的取悦观众的剧。每一季都给我们呈现出新鲜的故事、 地点、 人物、 时间框架，当然中心也会有微小改动。在第一季《凶宅》之后，有些演员像杰西卡兰格、莉莉拉贝、莎拉保罗森、埃文彼得斯 跻身主演，而另一些像康妮布里顿很遗憾没在之后的《美国的恐怖故事》中出演。

For this list, we did our best to choose vital and fascinating characters from all five completed seasons of American Horror Story. We have chosen our favorite major (and maybe one or two minor) characters from Murder House, Asylum, Coven, Freak Show, and Hotel. We also did our best not to select too heavily from one actor or one season. Expect spoilers for any season discussed.为此，我们尽力从《美国恐怖故事》前五季中挑选重要而且很吸引人的角色。我们从《凶宅》、《疯人院》、《女巫集会》、《畸形秀》、《旅馆》中选出最受喜爱的演员，当然尽可能不在同一部里选太多，每部都参加的除外。

1. Pepper – Freakshow / Asylum派泊——畸形秀/疯人院

2. Sister Mary Eunice – Asylum修女玛丽尤妮斯——疯人院

3. Liz Taylor – Hotel伊丽莎白泰勒——旅馆

4. Marie LaVeau – Coven血腥玛丽——女巫集会

5. Bloodyface – Asylum血脸杀手——疯人院

6. Bette and Dot Tattler – Freakshow连体姐妹——畸形秀

7. Sister Jude – Asylum 修女裘德——疯人院

声明：本双语文章的中文翻译系沪江英语原创内容，转载请注明出处。中文翻译仅代表译者个人观点，仅供参考。如有不妥之处，欢迎指正。

title: 外网总结《美国恐怖故事》前五季最好的角色，有你喜欢的吗？
